item.title: [READ BEFORE REPORTING A FACTION]
item.author: invalid@example.com (Arrly)
item.dc:creator: Arrly
item.content:encoded:
Faction Report Information

We always try our best to keep our network a safe playing environment for every faction and every player, both for casual and competitive gameplay. This is why we made some rules to make everything fair, which you can read HERE. Further explanations of the rules specific to this report section can be found HERE. However, you may encounter someone breaking these rules while there is no Team Factions member available to investigate the...
